html.p: It's important to read the documentation before using this app.

The calibration period is used for baselining expected successful user authentication behaviour. Please set the calibration time to the longest period possible (from 1 to 12 months is recommended - within your Authentication datamodel's acceleration). The investigation period should be set to the period of time you're concerned about and must be within the calibration period.

The table is sorted with the most concerning events at the top, however it's important not to interpret the results until the dashboard has completed loading. Any event with unique vectors above 2 or high cumulative vectors may indicate the user's credentials have been stolen.

search.query: | tstats count from datamodel=Authentication where Authentication.action=success Authentication.user="$user$" Authentication.user!="unknown" by _time,Authentication.app,Authentication.user,Authentication.dest,Authentication.src span=1s | `drop_dm_object_name("Authentication")` | lookup dnsLookup host as src | eval src_ip=coalesce(ip,src) | lookup tm_asn ip as src_ip | eval period=case(date_hour<5, 0, date_hour<8, 1, date_hour<12, 2, date_hour<5, 3, date_hour<8, 4, date_hour<24, 5) | reverse | streamstats count as as_count by user, autonomous_system | streamstats count as period_count by user, period | streamstats count as wday_count by user, date_wday | streamstats count as app_count by user, app | streamstats count as dest_count by user, dest | eval unique_vectors=if(as_count=1,1,0)+if(period_count=1,1,0)+if(wday_count=1,1,0)+if(app_count=1,1,0)+if(dest_count=1,1,0) | eval e=if(isnum("$investigation_period.earliest$"), "$investigation_period.earliest$", relative_time(now(),"$investigation_period.earliest$")) | eval l=if(isnum("$investigation_period.latest$"), "$investigation_period.latest$", if("$investigation_period.latest$"=="now",now(),relative_time(now(),"$investigation_period.latest$"))) | eventstats min(_time) as user_start by user | where unique_vectors>0 AND _time>=e AND _time<=l AND _time>(user_start+604800) | eventstats sum(unique_vectors) as cumulative_vectors by user | table _time user app src dest unique_vectors cumulative_vectors | sort 0 -unique_vectors -cumulative_vectors -_time
